title: Notice how top lane has been in the worst spot for the entire season now and no one bats an eye
body:
tank{{champion:105}} , tank {{champion:245}} , pre release{{champion:122}} .. now {{champion:39}}  is super strong and cant be dueled or handled. {{champion:50}}  top is a problem becasue u either take tp or bot loses if the other laner tps. so now you cant 1v1 {{champion:50}} or kill him without ignite early.
{{champion:104}} top is beyond disgusting and you cant 1v1 this champ.
{{champion:54}}  top is basically watching someone with 0 mechanics and full armor outduel and outdamage you with a point and click.
{{champion:48}}  top is unwinnable vs because hes the god of dueling and ganking and damaging and tanking and slowing and stealing stats...


when will we get some love?

check my match history and tell me top lane is fun whatsoever
finished playing vs tank fizz who was 3 levels lower and was still close to killing me EVERY.SINGLE.TIME.

edit: didnt think too many people would actually care about this. got a lot of comments from 1 trick voli mains to tell me riven/yasuo players are aids and that im bad when i actually have a 75 percent win ratio with both. but jealousy that someone has more mechanics on champions can take people a long way.

I swear, Top lane is where Riot and the Community put the shit no one wants to deal with at the top, whether its consciously decided or otherwise. I mean, really:

Abusing tank items? top lane
Hard to balance between jungle and another role/lane? top lane
literally broken? top lane
frustrating and anti-fun champs? top lane
champs no one gives a shit about? top lane

no wonder its such a shit show up there
Sucks that I've picked this lane to main for five years now. Still have no idea why I put myself through this cancer when I can main support and go to sleep

I am a top lane main my self and i main nasus, he's so fun to play if your any good, and I started to play a lot more jg and mid this season, although i have reverted back to top every now and then. Try picking strong picks in the top lane. Also, fyi, the most fucking bs champ that I have ever seen in top lane this season was fiora. Fuck that piece of shit, good thing she got nerfed into the ground.
I love nasus too, and he'd be so much more fun if he wasn't so prone to kiting. But if he had mobility or was less prone to kiting, he'd be the most broken thing ever without nerfs.
Ayyyy Doggo mains unite!
i still play fiora and shes still fine

Top lane is dominated by "ball of stats" and "1 dmg item then full tank assassins".

there is no balance found here.
Top has always been the filler role for powerful solo picks. It's both the embodiment of Solo and Team play, because it has such a wide variety of champions that can be played in the lane.

Only one I never fought top so far is Swain, so can't say much on him. But I beat Tank Ekko with Mundo fairly consistantly. Ekko can't slowly whittle him down and him building tanky doesn't mean much to Mundo when his Q and E do %damage. I actually made a few Tank Ekkos ragequit since their OP crap failed to even bother Mundo.

Trundle you just have to accept he is a better duelist and don't fight him, suck it up and just farm and be useful later, if you must fight him, make him waste his ult before actually trying to fight him. If he goes all in on you and uses his ult and you escape, he lost a large amount of his power and if you kept your own ult and such, can actually beat him.

Rest can be beaten if you know what you are doing. But different opinions is all.
you cant just "waste trundles ulti" . he has so many gapclosers and so much cc that its almost impossible to start a fight and get out without wasting flash.

He has 2 slow and a minor knock up. And 0 mobility aside his haste that doesnt even levels up first.

Unless you are playing a squishy CC-less inmobile anything, you can easily run away if Trundle engages on you.
Don't forget Cass is now #1 winrate top despite being supposedly designed as an extremely vulnerable midlane mage.

She was never vulnerable with all that sustain, that zoning slow and her MS boost. Her only point of weakness was building Tear. After, she can get RoA, Abyssal, Rylai's, whichever, especially as a top laner.

Ranged top laners have always resulted in stupidly lopsided matchups. Either engage on them and crush them completely or get poked for 15 minutes with no chance of retaliation. 

So annoying that Riot had to show favoritism to any and all mages because of this stubborn community. Anyone can see that balanced midrange mages should have low winrates. They should need to choose their windows of poke&engage perfectly and that will only come with a lot of experience.
Hope they kick out ranged champs from top lane. At least Karthus disappeared
I have half a mind to suggest buffing Doran's Shield vs ranged characters, even if that would buff melee mid lane assassins (and fighters) and possibly tank supports.

I'm kinda with you. I have a friend trying to learn top after ages of living in the jungle and when he asks me "what match up isnt super obnoxious to deal with?" I have no answer for him.

I mean, I play Vlad so I personally have no trouble with anything that isnt a decent Riven, but I agree with you in that overall top lane is in a shitty spot.

If it means anything, of the champs you listed; two of them are Assassins abusing tank items and innate poor design, two of them are slated for reworks in the near-ish future, and Malphite really needs gameplay updates. That leaves Darius (who imo is the **least** cancerous to deal with that you mentioned - which really says something) and Trundle, who is designed to be a god in duels and a royal shit in teamfights unless fed.

Even in soloQ, top lane is comprised of champions who: Can fall behind without being useless|Can snowball their lead somehow|Have good TP pressure|Can (counter)splitpush|Can (potentially) survive ganks/dives by themselves in a long lane
Any champion with such characteristics will be toxic (to play against). They're almost unbeatable based on what I just described.

That being said... firstly, you seem to be handling yourself pretty well. Secondly, if you're gonna call Irelia unbeatable because of stats, there's no reason not to hate on Jax, Riven, Yasuo or any other duelist as well. Thirdly, come on! Graves is a permapush bot but he doesn't outtrade/range you by virtue of existing as he used to. Not since he needed early crit for his passive AAs. Fourthly, tank Fizz sucks, shut up. Run away when his shark hits you (or don't get hit, works too) and poke/push him in after.

However I can see the fight going heavily in trundles favor if fiora is able to hold onto her counter she could somewhat outtrade trundle in a hit and run but trundle will simply outsustain and he can outdamage her trades if he so much gets a bite off or if she's forced to counter/gets baited out of counter.

While fiora COULD win vs trundle like most melee champs I don't see her winning most often vs trundle unless she really plays right and pushing the level 1-4 advantage.

What annoys me is when champions like Ekko and Fizz can build tank and come Top, out-tank and out-damage you, but nothing is ever done balance-wise. Plain and simple, Tank Ekko and Tank Fizz SHOULD NOT BE ALLOWED! It is beyond an alternate build path, its broken, literally not working as intended, gives them an unfair advantage, etc... Akali, Fizz, Ekko, and any other assassin building full tank should not be allowed to deal the most damage while being tankier than the enemy tank.  

Certain champions are also just way too strong, {{champion:122}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:48}} mainly. They are better than other Top laners in almost all aspects and never really fall off. Also don't tell me "oh just pick Ranged top you idiot" because Ranged champions in top lane are just as cancer as Tank Ekko/Fizz... They are not balanced around being top lane and this unfortunately makes them incredibly oppressive and far too strong early game. They also abuse the Top lane items better than their intended buyers... Also Irelia and Trundle don't struggle all that much against most Ranged champions.
I've seen Tank Akali, it never seems to work. Like, at all.

Also BTW i saw the whole argument on buying {{item:3123}} spending 800 gold to shut down a champion is a good cheap price to pay.
